name: OpenOptions
shortdesc: Options which may be supplied when opening a file.

property.name: updateLegacyText
property.shortdesc: Choose to update all text objects for documents saved with legacy texts (pre-Illustrator 11)

property.name: updateLegacyGradientMesh
property.shortdesc: Choose to preserve the spot colors in the gradient mesh objects for legacy documents (pre-Illustrator CS3)

property.name: preserveLegacyArtboard
property.shortdesc: Preserve Legacy Artboard (pre-Illustrator CS4) when opening in CS4 or later.

property.name: convertCropAreaToArtboard
property.shortdesc: Convert crop area to Artboard when opening legacy document (pre-Illustrator CS4) in CS4 or later. If false then crop areas are discarded.

property.name: createArtboardWithArtworkBoundingBox
property.shortdesc: Create Artboard with dimentions of artwork bounding box when opening legacy document (pre-Illustrator CS4) in CS4 or later.

property.name: convertTilesToArtboard
property.shortdesc: Convert print tiles to Artboard when opening legacy document (pre-Illustrator CS4) in CS4 or later.
